ValidationRule.description: Initiative Closure by Investment Area Manager
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Close_the_Initiative__c = true && (Total_Completed_Requirements__c != Total_Requirements__c || Total_Payments__c != Total_Completed_Payments__c || Pending_Measures__c != 0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To close the Initiative all Payments should be Paid, all Requirements should be Completed & no Measures should be Pending
